Brief Description: Runs the experiment function that is currently selected in the NTB Session panel's 'Experiment' dropdown menu.
Stops the currently running experiment (without closing the onscreen window).
Runs an eye calibration routine based on the settings selected in the :link-badge:`NTB_EyeCalSettings,Eye Calibration Settings,ref,badge-success  text-white,hallo` GUI
Manually delivers liquid reward to the subject based on the settings selected in the :link-badge:`NTB_RewardSettings,Reward Settings,ref,badge-success  text-white,hallo` GUI.
Play the audio file(s) selected in the :link-badge:`NTB_AudioSettings,Audio Settings,ref,badge-success  text-white,hallo` GUI.
Present a movie / movies based on the settings in the :link-badge:`NTB_MovieSettings,Movie Settings,ref,badge-success  text-white,hallo` GUI.
